trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement> can be used to represent a `goto` statement, which is used in some languages to redirect program flow to a specified label.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement> 用于表示`goto`语句，在某些语言中用于将程序流重定向到指定的标签。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement.Label%2A> property indicates the name of the label at which to continue program execution.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement.Label%2A>属性指示处继续执行程序的标签的名称。
并非所有语言都支持`goto`语句。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A> method with the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport.GotoStatements> flag to determine whether a code generator supports `goto` statements.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A>方法替换<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport.GotoStatements>标志确定是否支持代码生成器`goto`语句。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates use of a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement> and a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement> to redirect program flow.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement>和<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement>重定向程序流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor you must also set the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement.Label%2A> property to indicate the name of the label at which to continue program execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此构造函数还必须设置<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement.Label%2A>属性来指示处继续执行程序的标签的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the label at which to continue program execution.
trans-unit.target: 继续程序执行的位置处的标签名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement" /> class using the specified label name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的标签名初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the label at which to continue program execution.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置程序继续执行处的标签名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the name of the label at which to continue program execution.
trans-unit.target: 指示程序继续执行处的标签名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the name of the label at which to continue program execution.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示处继续执行程序的标签的名称。

trans-unit.source: A label can be represented by a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement>.
The label cannot be set because <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 不能设置此标签，因为 <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 或为空字符串。
